verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; on stringed instruments. Maschil of David; when the Ziphites came and said to Saul, Doth not David hide himself with us? <S%H3467>Save<s%> <S%H430>me<s%>, O God, by thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, And <S%H1777>judge<s%> me in thy <S%H1369>might<s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%> my <S%H8605>prayer<s%>, O <S%H430>God<s%>; Give <S%H238>ear<s%> to the <S%H561>words<s%> of my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>.

For <S%H2114>strangers<s%> are risen <S%H6965>up<s%> against <S%H6184>me<s%>, And violent men have <S%H1245>sought<s%> after my <S%H5315>soul<s%>: They have not <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> before <S%H5542>them<s%>. [[Selah
Behold <S%H430><s%>, God is my <S%H5826>helper<s%>: The <S%H136>Lord<s%> is of them that <S%H5564>uphold<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>.
He will <S%H7725>requite<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> unto mine <S%H8324>enemies<s%>: <S%H6789>Destroy<s%> thou them in thy <S%H571>truth<s%>.
With a <S%H5071>freewill-offering<s%> will I <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> unto <S%H3034>thee<s%>: I will give thanks unto thy <S%H8034>name<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>, for it is <S%H2896>good<s%>.
For he hath <S%H5337>delivered<s%> me out of all <S%H6869>trouble<s%>; And mine <S%H5869>eye<s%> hath <S%H7200>seen<s%> my desire upon mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>.
